about_the_game:
Welcome to a world where every step could be your last! In this thrilling turn-based PvP game, you'll find yourself in a dark maze full of dangers and mysteries. Along with other players and a terrifying monster (yes, the one you've been trying to forget since your breakup), you must survive by using various items to fend off all threats.

The goal is simple: find the ancient artifact and bring it to the altar to end the game. But don't think it will be easy! Other players also want to win, and every move can change the outcome of the game.

Immerse yourself in an atmosphere of horror under heavy, driving music that will make your heart beat faster. Feel the tension with every step and experience a true adrenaline rush when the monster starts chasing you.

Are you ready to take the challenge and become the champion of the maze? Join us and prove you can survive in this insane world! It is recommended to play with four players to experience the full spectrum of emotions and cooperation.

Immerse yourself in an atmosphere of horror under heavy, driving music that will make your heart beat faster. Feel the tension with every step and experience a true adrenaline rush when the monster starts chasing you.

Are you ready to take the challenge and become the champion of the maze? Join us and prove you can survive in this insane world! It is recommended to play with four players to experience the full spectrum of emotions and cooperation.
name: MAZEING

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: i5-7200u or similar
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon 520 or similar
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • VR Support: none
  • Additional Notes: playing on lower setting possible, but not granted
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 11
  • Processor: i3-10105f or similar
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 gb card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • VR Support: none
  • Additional Notes: playing on lower setting possible, but not granted

short_description: Well well well, what have we here? Scary maze huh? i'm really scared! So you are happened to be in a maze, you dont know where exactly, all you know there is your buddies there and a monster. For all this nightmare to end you need to find an artifact and place it on the altar.
supported_languages: English, Russian, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, French, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Finnish, Hungarian, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Turkish
